TAGLINE: In the heart of Toulouse, steps away from the famous Capitole square
INTRO_PARAGRAPH: Whether you're visiting for tourism, business, or as a student, the Hotel benefits from an ideal location in the heart of Toulouse, less than five minutes' walk from Place du Capitole. Fully renovated in January 2025, it offers 18 rooms combining modern comfort with an intimate atmosphere. You'll enjoy direct access to the lively city center, full of restaurants, shops, and cultural sites such as the Saint-Raymond Museum, the Saint-Sernin Basilica, and the prestigious universities and schools nearby.

ROOM_TYPES.name: Superior Double Room
ROOM_TYPES.shortDesc: King-size bed and generous space. This room features a spacious private bathroom with shower, as well as a television, desk, and wardrobe.

ROOM_TYPES.name: Standard Double Room
ROOM_TYPES.shortDesc: King-size bed. More compact private bathroom with shower. The room also includes a television and desk.

ROOM_TYPES.name: Twin Room with Private External Toilet
ROOM_TYPES.shortDesc: Two single beds. The room has a television and desk. The toilet is located outside but remains private for the room.

ROOM_TYPES.name: Twin Room with Shared External Toilet
ROOM_TYPES.shortDesc: Two single beds. The room has a television and desk. The toilet is located outside and shared.

ROOM_TYPES.name: Double Room with Shared Toilet
ROOM_TYPES.shortDesc: King-size bed. Television, desk and wardrobe included. The toilet is located outside and shared.

PARKING_INFO: Public parking at Capitole and Compans Cafarelli nearby.
PUBLIC_TRANSPORT_INFO: Easily accessible, the establishment is near the Capitole and Compans-Caffarelli metro stations, the train station, and only 5 km from Toulouse-Blagnac airport.
TOULOUSE_DESCRIPTION: The landscape of Toulouse's old town is characterized by the domes and turrets of its churches, towers and impressive townhouses. Cross the impressive Place du Capitole and wander through warm-toned streets with buildings featuring numerous balconies.
